name: ACCURSED (lucidserpentine)
description:
- - -

< Dev Note 12.08 //  ACCURSED will be receiving some updates in the next few weeks for bug issues re: gameplay tasks. Patch updates will be announced in the Devlog when available. Still feel free to leave feedback on what you think of the intro! >

- - -

Your brother is missing, your car's broken down, and you're in the middle of nowhere.

Your only option is to find the nearest place and ask for help. A phone. Anything.

But help never came. You never should have asked for it in the first place.

- 0 -

Play as Cameron Hurst, a man who gets trapped inside a mansion while looking for a way to get back home. A play on horror tropes, Accursed sets out to subvert players' expectations in a short indie experience.

Complete with voice acting and additional collectibles.

Will you find your way out alive, or end up sharing your brother's fate?

- 1 -

Average Playthrough:

30+ minutes

Controls

WASD - move   >>   SHIFT -  sprint

LEFT-CLICK - pick-up   >>   RIGHT-CLICK  -  throw objects

Q - pause game   >>   TAB  -  open inventory

 F  -  flashlight   >>   E  -  interact

- 2 -

- 4 -
